content.rendered: University of La Verne faculty offer study tours abroad of a week or more during January Interterm, Spring Break, and Summer. They teach part of the class on the La Verne, California Campus and part of it while in the featured country.  Detailed information about study tours can be obtained from the faculty teaching them.
